entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support sync namespace for partial classes #66244
  • Include AdditionalLocations in diagnostic baselines #66240
  • Improve interpolated string handler compilation errors #66235
    Backlog
  • ChangeSignatureCodeRefactoringProvider throws a NullReferenceException #66224

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33304.99 #66237
  • ArgumentException from RemoteDiagnosticAnalyzerService #66138
  • Removed analyzers still show up in solution explorer (legacy .csproj) #66044
  • Deprecate all public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #63440
    17.5
  • When a diagnostic is disabled by default, updating the rule does not enable it #66085
  • Cannot rename a class that contains a GeneratedRegex method #66208
  • Convert foreach to LINQ can leave unnecessary parentheses #39727
    Backlog
  • Replace `DeclarationScope` with `ScopedKind` #64248
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Emit stackalloc block initializer for byte-sized enums #66251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ensure that side effects of conditional access on an instance of a nullable type are not preserved in generic code #66250
    Area-Compilers
  • Unify `ConstantValueOpt` and `ConstantValue` properties #66248
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • workaround tabular data control focus issue #66247
    Area-IDE
  • Allow missing document in method debug info (#66183) #66246
    Area-Interactive
  • Fix potential invalid TextSpan when reporting FAR results #66245
    Area-IDE
  • Mitigate crash in navigate-to. #66242
    Area-IDE
  • Fix a couple of cases where feature options were not being hooked up. #66241
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid contract failures in PreviewSolutionCrawlerRegistrationService … #66239
    Area-IDE
  • Apply XAML template on AbstractCheckBoxViewModel instead of one specific subclass #66238
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Implemented `Make property required` codefix #66233
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66243
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Allow rename on items also defined in SG #66209
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2079458 #66227
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66236
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Snap 17.5 P3 #66214
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release 17.6 back to main #66218
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Ensure solution is fully loaded before gathering semantic errors #66234
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add tests that verify options with language specific storage location… #66222
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Skip implicit build optimization for false value of `OptimizeImplicitlyTriggeredBuild` #66182
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Incremental Generators docs update #63500
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Fix race condition in PerformanceQueue.AnalyzerNumberAssigner #66230
    Area-Analyzers, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • Account for SpecificDiagnosticOptions in analyzer driver checks for enabling a disabled by default rule #66087
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Next
  • If you see parentheses simplify them #66203
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66228
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66226
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update config file #66217
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66223
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66213
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove DeclarationScope in favor of ScopedKind #66180
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • use dnceng vms to kickoff helix runs #66253
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Infrastructure/use different images #66255
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't rely on unset values from BitVector in nullable state #66174
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Generate static field for ReadOnlySpan created from array without an initializer (#33088) #37897
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Block `delegate*<void>...enum` constants in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix state for pattern declarations on subsequent iterations #66136
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.5
  • Emit defensive copy for constrained call on `in` parameter #66189
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66252
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle capturing of primary constructor parameters within queries and in type-or-value scenarios #66254
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Framework compilers package for SDK consumption #66206
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust assert to account for error scenarios #66202
    Area-Compilers
  • Copy all diagnostic info from derived classes when changing severity of a diagnostic #66038
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support Go To Definition in Object Browser for metadata references #66026
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Include [UnscopedRef] parameter attributes in synthesized delegate types #66035
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE
  • Move VS specific option storage locations to VS layer #66042
    Area-IDE
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add experimental API #65831
    Area-Compilers
  • Optimize StringBuilder calculations for netcoreapp3.1 and newer #66156
    Area-Compilers
  • Report error implementing interface with `[UnscopedRef]` member #66024
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Add a helper diagnostic for enforcing IDE0005 (remove unnecessary usi… #58835
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Trampoline to a base method implementation when deleting an override #65481
    Area-Compilers
  • Move constants to RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #66097
    Area-Compilers
